Verna:
Your curiosity is commendable, but it must end here. Exposing the secret to the Kamaels' birth requires permission from Kamael Hierarch Kekropus and the hidden heroes. A day may come when the secret is made known to the world - or, if you help calm this berserk defense system, I may be able to tell you something.
Now, weren't you in the middle of something? You should go back.
